meaningMnemonic: Your <radical>soul</radical> is going <radical>wild</radical> because you're <kanji>confused</kanji>. If you're confused, it's usually because you don't know what's going on or what to do. This makes the soul inside your body go absolutely wild!
readingMnemonic: Whenever you're <kanji>confused</kanji>, <reading>こう</reading>いち appears to offer you guidance. He's confused a lot, so he knows how to help. And knowledge offered by こういち is the best medicine for confusion.
